title: Desires and Dreams and Powers
description: "Truth," she said, "is stronger than magic."Three sisters fall in love with the star their father holds captive in the basement.Three brothers set out for the factory where gods are made.Three young women meet and match wits with the beautiful, heartless forestborn.In this anthology of twenty stories by NYT-bestselling author Rosamund Hodge—including three set in the world of Crimson Bound—horror and wonder go hand-in-hand, and even when all hope is lost . . . truth is stronger than magic.
author: Rosamund Hodge
